observation: Flexible Automation & Custom Automation Systems | RNA Automation  Products Automated Feeding and Handling Bowl Feeders Vibratory Bowl Feeders Pharmaceutical Bowl Feeders Automotive Clip Bowl Feeders EcoType™ Bowl Feeders Linear Feeders Centrifugal Feeders Flexible Feeders VariTend™ VariFeed® VariCube R™ VariPic™ FlexType™ Series Step Feeders Automatic Spring Separator Spares & Standard Equipment Custom Automation Special Purpose Machinery Rotary Indexing Machines Robotic Systems Vision Inspection Systems Automated Assembly Machines Services Applications Industries Case Studies Downloads Insights Blog News About us Our Company 360° Factory Virtual Tour Worldwide Presence Company History Corporate Social Responsibility FAQs Why Automate in Manufacturing Contact × Scroll We Automate and Assemble View products Visit Feeding & Handling View systems Close Read more View all Sectors 01 Life Sciences Test kits, Needles, Glass Vials, Inhaler Body Mouldings, Disposable Syringes... View solutions 02 Automotive Clips, Weld-Nuts, Aluminum Casings, Valve Seats, Casings... 03 Consumer Goods Polish Brush, Disposable Razor, Cardboard Shells, Cartridge Ristons, Cap Lids... 04 Food and Beverages Wrapped Chocolate Bars, Cereal Bars, Protein Bars, Energy Bars, Fruit Bars… 05 Electronics Caps F6, Capacitor Casings, Electrical Bugs, Cylindrical Gains… 06 Plastics RNA help plastics processors to integrate automated operations, adding value and improving the safety of plastic production. A selection of our clients Who we are With eight manufacturing across Europe About RNA RNA are at the forefront of automation technology, delivering market leading solution to the world’s most successful manufacturers Why Automation Latest news 01.02.2024 RNA Raised £1425 throughout 2023 for Chosen Charity Read article 07.12.2023 RNA Automation Spreads Holiday Cheer for Charity 16.11.2023 RNA’s Annual Bake-Off for Children in Need a Sweet Success Advice Ask us anything, we’re here to help +44 (0)121 749 2566 sales@rnaautomation.com Sign up to our newsletter Get exciting news and updates in the future. See our Privacy Policy Name Email Address This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. Links About Client Login Terms & Conditions Find us Fax: +44 (0)121 749 6217 Web Design & Marketing by Assisted © 2024 RNA Automation Limited We use cookies to give you the best experience on our site.  By using our site you accept our . Accept Manage consent Privacy Overview This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the ... Necessary Always Enabled Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. These cookies ensure basic functionalities and security features of the website, anonymously. Cookie Duration Description cookielawinfo-checkbox-analytics 11 months This cookie is set by GDPR Cookie Consent plugin. The cookie is used to store the user consent for the cookies in the category "Analytics". cookielawinfo-checkbox-functional The cookie is set by GDPR cookie consent to record the user consent for the cookies in the category "Functional". cookielawinfo-checkbox-performance viewed_cookie_policy The cookie is set by the GDPR Cookie Consent plugin and is used to store whether or not user has consented to the use of cookies. It does not store any personal data. Functional Functional cookies help to perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collect feedbacks, and other third-party features. Performance Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors. Analytics Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc. Advertisement Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with relevant ads and marketing campaigns. These cookies track visitors across websites and collect information to provide customized ads. Others Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet. SAVE & ACCEPT Notifications

thought: The content of the website doesn't seem to indicate any of the scam characteristics. It appears to be a professional company website offering automation systems and services. The presence of detailed product descriptions, company history, charity work, and client information suggests legitimacy. However, further analysis is required to confirm this.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain has been registered since 2010, and the domain status is okay, which suggests that it is not a recently created domain often associated with scam sites. The domain uses privacy protection services, which is not uncommon for legitimate businesses. The domain is set to expire in 2025, indicating a commitment to maintaining the domain. However, to be thorough, I should check for any public complaints or issues related to the domain.

Scammers impersonate well-known companies, recruit for fake jobs on LinkedIn and other job platforms

thought: The search results do not indicate any direct complaints or scam accusations related to rnaautomation.com. The Wikipedia page suggests that RNA Automation is an established company. No scam alerts or negative reports were found in the search results specifically mentioning "rnaautomation.com scam." This adds credibility to the website and the business. It's also worth noting that the website's content and the information provided seem professional and related to a legitimate business. Given the website content, the age of the domain, the lack of negative reports, and the appearance of the company on Wikipedia, it seems that the website is legitimate and not a scam. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.rnaautomation.com/ does not appear to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The website has existed since 2010 with a domain status of 'ok' provides detailed professional information about their services and products uses privacy protection services common for businesses has no direct scam accusations found through search results and is mentioned in a Wikipedia article as an established company.
